article_title: Double Down: McCain Mocks Concerns Over Poker Playing During Syria Hearing via Twitter
article_body: On Tuesday, after being caught playing online poker on his iPhone during a Senate Syria hearing, Sen. John McCain (R-AZ) fired back via Twitter:Ben Shapiro is Editor-At-Large of Breitbart News and author of the New York Times bestseller “Bullies: How the Left’s Culture of Fear and Intimidation Silences America” (Threshold Editions, January 8, 2013).
comment_texts:
He and his pals Graham, Reid, McConnell & Pelosi are in the early stages of DEMENTIA. They need to be retired. Problem is, all these politicians 
want to stay in DC, until their last breath. Is it GREED for power and money? Or is it because they really have no life outside of Washington?? Old Ted Kennedy
showed up in his office each day until he became comatose, so he 
never planned to retire.
